entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Squamish
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind light except north 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind light except north 50 km/h gusting to 70 over southern sections. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind light except north 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
